control.visible: substring(VideoPlayer.studio,MPEG Audio) + ![substring(VideoPlayer.studio,DX50) | substring(VideoPlayer.studio,divx) | substring(VideoPlayer.studio,DIV3) | substring(VideoPlayer.studio,xvid)] + [substring(VideoPlayer.studio,SD) | substring(VideoPlayer.studio,480) | substring(VideoPlayer.studio,540) | substring(VideoPlayer.studio,576)]
